headline.main: CHIEF IN FAR EAST HAILS U.S. BOMBERS; Eubank Tells of Heroism of His Men in Philippines and in the Battle of Java 120 MEDALS ARE AWARDED Flying Fortresses Said to Have Downed 50 Planes and Sunk or Damaged 60 Ships

lead_paragraph: AT UNITED NATIONS HEADQUARTERS, Australia, March 31 -- Apparently it is a tossup whether the United States should be prouder of its Flying Fortresses or the American boys who man them. Both have written magnificent records in the Java Battle and in the Philippines.
